condition: Text for the survey question goes here. If more than one experiemental condition, set other rows too. See the paper "Replicating energy social surveys with Large Language Model agents" by Fell 2024 for examples.
response: Respond in JSON format. Instructions on how to respond go here. Keep the instruction to respond in JSON format or problems could result

condition: Text for the second experiemental condition goes here, and so on. Adjust probabilities accordingly.
